name: releaseNotes
description: Generate release notes and other documents as Markdown, HTML or PDF. Publish to Azure DevOps Wikis, Azure Repos, Confluence and more
author: Agile Extensions

inputs.name: notes
inputs.label: Bravo Notes template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a template previously created via the Bravo Notes UI.

inputs.name: workItemSource
inputs.label: Work item source

options.AssociatedSinceCommit: Associated Work items since specified starting commit

inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify what work items should be pulled into the template. Associated Work items = Work items associated with the current build or the current release. The latter only pulls in Work items associated since the last successful deployment of the current environment. When using JSON file as source the expected format is a array of objects with an "id" property e.g. [{"id": 345}, {"id": 654}]

inputs.name: compareWithReleaseDefinition
inputs.label: Release definition to compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release definition to compare against

inputs.name: compareWithReleaseEnvironment
inputs.label: Release definition environment to compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Release definition environment to compare against

inputs.name: compareWithEnvironment
inputs.label: Environment to compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment to compare against

inputs.name: fromCommit
inputs.label: Starting commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: When looking for work items Bravo Notes will consider past commits after the specified starting commit.

inputs.name: workItemTypeResolving
inputs.label: Work items to resolve
inputs.helpMarkDown: Chose to load work items directly associated to the build / release or to load parent work items of the specified type.
inputs.visibleRule: workItemSource = Associated || workItemSource = AssociatedSinceCommit || workItemSource = JsonFile

inputs.name: workItemTypesToLoad
inputs.label: Work Item types
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify one work item type name per line

inputs.name: queryId
inputs.label: Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a saved Work Item query to execute.

inputs.name: workItemSourceIterationTeam
inputs.label: Team
inputs.visibleRule: workItemSource = CurrentIteration || workItemSource = LastIteration || workItemSource = NextIteration

inputs.name: inputFilePath
inputs.label: Input file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to read from item data from

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of the rendered document

inputs.name: htmlToMarkdown
inputs.label: Turn HTML to markdown (experimental)
inputs.helpMarkDown: HTML tags included in your template or content will be turned into the according markdown syntax or removed.

inputs.name: documentTitle
inputs.label: HTML document title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Title in exported HTML document. Defaults to title defined in template.

inputs.name: handleImages
inputs.label: Handle images
inputs.helpMarkDown: If images are included in the generated document, this option controls how to handle them. Image URLs will be adjusted accordingly.

inputs.name: outputTarget
inputs.label: Output target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target to store the rendered document

inputs.name: alternateTargetProject
inputs.label: Alternate target project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose a team project different from the project where this pipeline is defined when exporting to a Wiki

inputs.name: targetProject
inputs.label: Target Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project to export to

inputs.name: outputFilePath
inputs.label: Output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to write rendered notes to e.g. releasenotes.pdf

inputs.name: targetRepository
inputs.label: Target repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git repository to store the generated file

inputs.name: targetRepositoryBranch
inputs.label: Target branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch in to commit the generated file to

inputs.name: targetRepositoryPath
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in selected repository to save generated file to

inputs.name: targetRepositoryCommitMessage
inputs.label: Commit message
inputs.defaultValue: Adds release notes generated in pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Commit message to use for adding the generated file to the selected repository

inputs.name: targetRepositoryCommitAuthorEmail
inputs.label: Commit author email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Auhtor email to use for the commit

inputs.name: emailBody
inputs.label: Email body
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The content of the email. Use markdown for formatting.

The contents of your Bravo Notes doucment will be sent as an email attachment.

inputs.name: emailReplyTo
inputs.label: Reply email address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replies to emails sent via Bravo Notes will arrive at this email address

inputs.name: emailFromName
inputs.label: From name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Appears as `[From name] via Bravo Notes <emails@bravonotes.com>` for the email recipient

inputs.name: emailAttachmentFileName
inputs.label: Email attachment file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Title of the selected template will be used as a file name by default, e.g. 'latest-release-notes.pdf'

inputs.name: targetWiki
inputs.label: Target Wiki
inputs.helpMarkDown: Wiki to store the generated markdown file

inputs.name: targetWikiPath
inputs.label: Wiki page path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Path to Wiki page to write rendered notes to.

Bravo Notes syntax supported e.g. `My daily page from {{date 'dd.mm.yyyy'}}`.

Examples:

Target page

Parent page/Target page

inputs.name: targetWikiBranch
inputs.label: Wiki branch (only needed for Code Wikis)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch of the repository backing the selected wiki to push to

inputs.name: targetWikiPdfAttachment
inputs.label: Attach PDF to Wiki page
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate and attach a PDF version at the bottom of the target wiki page. Use the `@wikiPagePdfAttachmentPath` placeholder in your template to customize the placement of the attachment link.

inputs.name: confluenceApiToken
inputs.label: Confluence api token
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can generate an API token [here](https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens)

inputs.name: confluencePageTitle
inputs.label: Confluence page title
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Title of the page to create or update.

Bravo Notes syntax supported e.g. `My daily page from {{date 'dd.mm.yyyy'}}`

inputs.name: confluenceParentPagePath
inputs.label: Confluence parent pages
inputs.helpMarkDown:
List of parent/ancestor page titles - one per line. Non-existent pages will be created.

Bravo Notes syntax supported e.g. `My daily page from {{date 'dd.mm.yyyy'}}`

This option takes precendence over the "Confluence parent page id" option.

Example:

Root page\
Child of root page\
Parent of target page

inputs.name: confluenceUseV2Editor
inputs.label: Confluence use new editor for new pages

inputs.name: httpUploadUrl
inputs.label: Upload the generated document to this URL with a HTTP POST request

inputs.name: emptyWorkItemListTaskResult
inputs.label: Handle empty work item list

options.warn: Warn - task should succeed with a warning

inputs.helpMarkDown: Control the result of the task in case no work items are found.

inputs.name: skipExportOnEmptyWorkItemList
inputs.label: Skip export on empty work item list
inputs.helpMarkDown: Don't export if no work items are found.

inputs.name: addAttachment
inputs.label: Add attachment to pipeline result
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uses the markdown representation of the template rendering and publishes it to Azure Pipelines so it can be permanently seen in the pipeline summary page.

inputs.name: proxy
inputs.label: HTTPS Proxy

options.auto: Auto - use agent and environment proxy settings

inputs.helpMarkDown:
When set to `Auto` - proxy settings from your build agent (`.proxy` file) and environment variables `HTTP_PROXY`, `HTTPS_PROXY` and `NO_PROXY` will be respected.

`Auto` will become the default in future versions.

inputs.name: stopLabel
inputs.label: Stop label key
inputs.helpMarkDown: When looking up the work item hierarchy from associated work items, when a work item with the specified stop label is found parents of that item will not be imported.
